descriptions: Fails to identify any central ideas in the text.
Identifies only one central idea, but it is vague or inaccurate.
Identifies two central ideas, but one is not clearly stated or relevant.
Identifies two central ideas, but the explanation of their relevance is superficial.
Identifies two clear and relevant central ideas with a reasonable explanation of their importance.
Accurately identifies two or more central ideas that are thoroughly explained with clear relevance to the text.
Provides no analysis of how the central ideas develop over the course of the text.
Attempts to describe the development of the central ideas, but the analysis is unclear or irrelevant.
Describes the development of one central idea with limited coherence.
Describes the development of both central ideas, but the analysis lacks depth or insight.
Provides a coherent analysis of how the central ideas develop, but it may not fully explore their interaction.
Offers a thorough and insightful analysis of how the central ideas develop and interact to provide a complex understanding of the text.
The summary is missing or completely inaccurate.
The summary is very brief and includes significant inaccuracies or biases.
The summary includes some key points but is too brief or contains minor inaccuracies.
The summary is generally accurate but may include some subjective interpretations or omit some important details.
Provides an accurate and relatively complete summary of the text, with minimal bias.
Provides a concise, accurate, and objective summary of the text, capturing all key points without personal opinions or misrepresentations.
